game.name: Free For Fall
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 공유 상자에서 장애물을 잡고, 코스에 배치한 다음, 모두가 만든 치명적인 건틀릿을 질주하는 3D 파티 플랫포머. 자신만의 함정에서 살아남으면서 친구들을 따돌려보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A 3D party platformer where you grab obstacles from a shared box, place them on the course, then race through the deadly gauntlet you all created. Outsmart your friends while surviving your own traps!

reviewHighlights.text: for every like or funny rating i will eat 1 spoonful of mayo on second thought please dont like this great game tho! only problems are the servers are...
its not the best game and there is no tutorial but its still good and funny 6/10
